author: solomax
msg: [OPENMEETINGS-556] server side recording code is synced between branches and cleaned up

author: elecharny
msg: Deleted the LDAP Con banner, fixed some formatng

author: stefan2
msg: Although svn_fs_initialize is supposed to be called in a single-threaded
context, multi-threaded applications might not be aware of the fact that
they must call this function explicitly before any other svn_fs_* API.
So, lift the single-threaded call requirement here as a courtesy to all
(common_pool_initialized): A new flag governing module initialization.
(synchronized_initialize): New function containing the body of ...
(svn_fs_initialize): ... this one.  Make sure we initialize the module
get_library_vtable): Don't make module initialization dependent on
common_pool as that is not fully synchronized.
Let the init. function take care of it instead.
